meanings.definition: Resembling a gable in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The roof had a gablelike structure that added charm to the house.
meanings.sent2: The gablelike design of the building made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The gablelike pattern on the curtains made them look like miniature houses.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was gablelike, with its sharp angles and pointed features.
meanings.sent5: The gablelike silhouette of the mountain against the sunset was breathtaking.
